STR_U.val: in (select PEENGENH.Cd_recurso_insu from PEENGENH inner join ESMATERI on PEENGENH.Cd_recurso_insu = ESMATERI.Cd_material and ESMATERI.Cd_grupo = 'UC'))

ExpSyntax.val: Translate('%CIGAM_INSTAL%')&'CGReport.exe -G: -M:"'&Translate('%CIGAM_INSTAL%')&'Systempar\Relatorios\Material\custo.frx" -A:"'&Translate('%CIGAM_INSTAL%')&'Temp\355' & Translate('%USUARIO%') & '.frx" -P:@P_mat="' & Trim({0,7}) & '" -P:@P_marca=" "' & ' -P:@P_data=' & ASCIIChr(39) & DStr({0,18},'YYYY-MM-DD') & ASCIIChr(39)
